devdoc.details: We accept sender and receiver as bytes32 to handle arbitrary remote address formats.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

assignJob((uint32,bytes,bytes32,uint64,a.details: Returns a minimal fee and doesn't actually assign any job. You can override this function to return a different fee or to implement a fee mechanism.

commit(bytes,uint64,uint32,bytes32,uint3.details: Accepts all address fields as bytes32 to support non-EVM senders (e.g. Solana pubkeys).

params._dstEid: Destination chain EID (should match contract's localEid)
params._localOApp: Receiver address on this chain (standard EVM address)
params._message: Raw message (e.g., v1 OFT send: [PT_SEND || receiver || amountSD])
params._remoteOApp: Sender address on source chain as bytes32 (no casting)

params._receiveUln: Address of this chain's deployed ReceiveUln302

getFee(uint32,uint64,address,bytes).details: Returns a minimal fee for testing purposes. You can override this function to return a different fee or to implement a fee mechanism.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verify(bytes,uint64,uint32,bytes32,uint3.details: This is the first function that should be called in the message verification process.Accepts all address fields as bytes32 to support non-EVM senders (e.g. Solana pubkeys).

params._dstEid: Destination chain EID (should match contract’s localEid)
params._localOApp: Receiver address on this chain (standard EVM address)
params._message: Raw message (e.g., v1 OFT send: [PT_SEND || receiver || amountSD])
params._remoteOApp: Sender address on source chain as bytes32 (no casting)

devdoc.title: SimpleDVNMock

assignJob((uint32,bytes,bytes32,uint64,a.notice: Assign job and return DVN fee (mock implementation)

commit(bytes,uint64,uint32,bytes32,uint3.notice: Manually commits a packet for execution.

verify(bytes,uint64,uint32,bytes32,uint3.notice: Manually verifies a packet sent to this chain.

userdoc.notice: A minimal DVN for manually verifying messages, for development use on testnets. Not for production. Deploy this on the destination chain.
